mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule_tb (staff_id, start_day, end_day, information) VALUES (#{staffId}, #{startDay}, #{endDay}, #{information});
mapper.select: SELECT id, staff_id, date_format(start_day,'%m-%d') AS start_day, date_format(end_day,'%m-%d') AS end_day, information, YEAR(start_day) as year, MONTH(start_day) AS month FROM schedule_tb ORDER BY start_day;

SELECT id, staff_id, date_format(start_day,'%m-%d') AS start_mday, date_format(end_day,'%m-%d') AS end_mday, staff_id, start_day, end_day, information, YEAR(start_day) as year FROM schedule_tb WHERE id = #{id};
SELECT mouth, count(mouth) AS sum FROM schedule_tb GROUP BY mouth HAVING COUNT(mouth) > 1;
SELECT * FROM schedule_tb WHERE MONTH(start_day) = #{month} OR MONTH(end_day) = #{month};
